nodes.text: The Jedi Praxeum was located on the Outer Rim Territories planet Ossus, operated by the Jedi Order. The temple had mosaic floors, and those floors were salvaged and used within the Order's newer headquarters on the galactic capital world of Coruscant. The Ossus temple, once believed to be the first Jedi Temple, was also the original location of the Force-sensitive Great Tree.
